memberdef.definition: using CGAL::Shape_detection::Point_set::Least_squares_line_fit_region< GeomTraits, Item_, PointMap, NormalMap >::Region_index_map = boost::associative_property_map<Region_unordered_map>
memberdef.name: Region_index_map

memberdef.definition: CGAL::Shape_detection::Point_set::Least_squares_line_fit_region< GeomTraits, Item_, PointMap, NormalMap >::Least_squares_line_fit_region
memberdef.name: Least_squares_line_fit_region

parameterdescription.para: a sequence of Named Parameters among the ones listed below

listitem.para: the maximum distance from a point to a line
the maximum angle in degrees between the normal of a point and the normal of a line
the cos value computed as cos(maximum_angle * PI / 180), this parameter can be used instead of the maximum_angle
the minimum number of 2D points a region must have
an instance of PointMap that maps an item to Kernel::Point_2
an instance of NormalMap that maps an item to Kernel::Vector_2

memberdef.definition: Region_index_map CGAL::Shape_detection::Point_set::Least_squares_line_fit_region< GeomTraits, Item_, PointMap, NormalMap >::region_index_map
memberdef.name: region_index_map

detaileddescription.para: This function creates an empty property map that maps iterators on the input range Item to std::size_t.

memberdef.definition: Primitive CGAL::Shape_detection::Point_set::Least_squares_line_fit_region< GeomTraits, Item_, PointMap, NormalMap >::primitive
memberdef.name: primitive

detaileddescription.para: This function provides the last primitive that has been fitted with the region.

simplesect.para: Primitive parameters that fits the region

para.computeroutput: successful fitted primitive via successful call of update(region) with a sufficient large region

memberdef.definition: bool CGAL::Shape_detection::Point_set::Least_squares_line_fit_region< GeomTraits, Item_, PointMap, NormalMap >::is_part_of_region
memberdef.name: is_part_of_region

detaileddescription.para: This function controls if a point with the index query_index is within the maximum_distance from the corresponding line and if the angle between its normal and the line's normal is within the maximum_angle. If both conditions are satisfied, it returns true, otherwise false.

query
item of the query point
The last parameter is not used in this implementation.

memberdef.definition: bool CGAL::Shape_detection::Point_set::Least_squares_line_fit_region< GeomTraits, Item_, PointMap, NormalMap >::is_valid_region
memberdef.name: is_valid_region

detaileddescription.para: This function controls if the region contains at least minimum_region_size points.

parameterdescription.para: indices of points included in the region

memberdef.definition: bool CGAL::Shape_detection::Point_set::Least_squares_line_fit_region< GeomTraits, Item_, PointMap, NormalMap >::update
memberdef.name: update

detaileddescription.para: This function fits the least squares line to all points from the region.

parameterdescription.para: indices of points included in the region

simplesect.para: Boolean true if the line fitting succeeded and false otherwise

briefdescription.para: Region type based on the quality of the least squares line fit applied to 2D points.

detaileddescription.para: This class fits a line, using PCA, to chunks of points in a 2D point set and controls the quality of this fit. If all quality conditions are satisfied, the chunk is accepted as a valid region, otherwise rejected.

parameterdescription.para: a descriptor representing a given point. Must be a model of Hashable.
a model of ReadablePropertyMap whose key type is the value type of the input range and value type is Kernel::Point_2
a model of ReadablePropertyMap whose key type is the value type of the input range and value type is Kernel::Vector_2
